metadata.name: Lines that Guide
metadata.description:
Fine Art frame that based on Good Composition and contrast. 

this fine art frame is part of series "Light of knowledge" 

The Series is based on the archetype of a guide and the wise man who shows a path and tame hero who is mired in darkness. With this closeup Frame we wanted to show that each aspect the of character (Guide or wise man) such as his did and consequences of did whether it is coming from the wickedness of him those are lines that guide the hero towards his path. and we tried to put this idea by playing with lines, curves, and contrast. composition itself guides viewers eyes and this aspect we tried to symbolize as a Guidance.
